short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Having trouble sending links to devices? DiGiT-QR Has your back! Copy, Scan & Open links With Ease!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A very simple application developed solely for individuals struggling to open links on devices.

QR Codes for websites so you can scan them on any device, and open the website with ease!

Features:
- QR-Code Based On Current Tab
- Link Copying
- Accessibility!

Case Study: A good friend was having issues and looking for a simple way to open links from a phone on a different browser that he preferred. His mobile could not be connected to his Google account and therefore could not directly send links to his devices.

Making an application that will eliminate this issue was simple, using generic API and styling, we were able to solve his problem!

Install the extension, click the icon, scan with phone! Its just that easy!

What can you expect to see next?
- Themes
- Dark / Light Mode
- Smoother UI
- Integrations
- Locales
- More...

What are you waiting for, just download the darn thing!!!
